channel.title: Remove the RuneScape Classic Boards
channel.description: Lets face it, it's a sad section full of failure and script kiddies that only contribute to the collective retardation of the community. Why not remove it? I highly doubt it drives any real traffic anymore. Anyway, thought I'd post this to see who actually think it's worth keeping and why.

item.title: Remove the RuneScape Classic Boards
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

If you don’t like the section you can hide it easily with the -/+ buttons. There is enough activity there now to justify keeping it.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove the RuneScape Classic Boards
item.dc:creator: @teddybear13 teddybear13
item.description:
@teddybear13 wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:2, topic:541694”][quote author=teddybear13 link=topic=660563.msg4416549#msg4416549 date=1396161809]
it’s a sad section full of failure and script kiddies that only contribute to the collective retardation of the community.
[/quote]

How is this any different from the RS2 sections?[/quote]

RS2 is vastly more popular, which still brings in more traffic and a reason to keep the sections alive. Can’t really say the same for RSC.

Read full topic
